content: As an AI language model, I can not predict with certainty what new ice cream flavors we may see in the future. However, given the creativity of food scientists and chefs, it's highly likely that we will see new ice cream flavors that we haven't even thought of yet. With advances in technology, food scientists might be able to create new flavors by analyzing the chemical composition of existing ingredients and predicting how they might combine in unique ways. Additionally, the development of new ingredients and new techniques for flavor extraction and infusion might lead to new ice cream flavors. There are already some unusual ice cream flavors such as lavender, balsamic vinegar, and corn on the cob. So, the future of ice cream flavors may be unpredictable, but it's highly likely that we will continue to see new and exciting flavors emerge in the coming years.
